body: The Malaria Elimination Oversight Committee (MEOC) works with countries to achieve malaria-free status. The committee aims to maintain a 360-degree overview of how countries and regions are advancing towards malaria elimination.
title: Malaria Elimination Oversight Committee
recommendation:
All cases of suspected malaria should have a parasitological test (microscopy or Rapid diagnostic test (RDT)) to confirm the diagnosis.
Both microscopy and RDTs should be supported by a quality assurance programme.
Good practice statement
